channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Spectrum Power 4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Spectrum Power 4

item.title: CVE-2022-26476|2024-08-03T05:03:32.863Z -- siemens -- spectrum%20power%204
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Spectrum Power 4 (All versions using Shared HIS), Spectrum Power 7 (All versions using Shared HIS), Spectrum Power MGMS (All versions using Shared HIS). An unauthenticated attacker could log into the component Shared HIS used in Spectrum Power systems by using an account with default credentials. A successful exploitation could allow the attacker to access the component Shared HIS with administrative privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-23312|2024-08-03T03:36:20.385Z -- siemens -- spectrum%20power%204
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Spectrum Power 4 (All versions < V4.70 SP9 Security Patch 1). The integrated web application "Online Help" in affected product contains a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could be exploited if unsuspecting users are tricked into accessing a malicious link.
